steps.name: As an entity user, I am logged in
I navigate to the customers tab

elements.name: As a user when I navigate to the Customers Tab, I should see New customer button

steps.name: I should see the New Customer button displayed

elements.name: As a user when I log in, I should see the four buttons

steps.name: I should be on the Dasboard home page
I should see the buttons "Amount Due", "Customers", "Invoices", and "Estimates"
As an entity user, I am logged in

elements.name: As a user, I am able to create an item or a service

steps.name: I click on the Add Item button
I should be on item input page
I provide item information name "Coffee mike", price "1800", unit "pc", and description "very nice coffee mug"
The Item is added to the Item list table

elements.name: User should be able to login with valid credentials

steps.name: As a user, I am on the login page
I enter valid useremail and valid password
